content: उपश्रुतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Hearing, listening. {@--2@} Range of hearing. {@--3@} A supernatural voice heard at night, and personified as a nocturnal deity revealing the future; नक्तं निर्गत्य यत्किंचिच्छुभाशुभकरं वचः . श्रूयते तद्विदुर्धीरा देवप्रश्नमुपश्रुतिं .. <ls>Hārāvalī</ls>; परिजनोऽपि चास्याः सततमुपश्रुत्यै निर्जगाम <ls>K. 65.</ls> {@--4@} Aspect of the stars, fortune-telling. {@--5@} Promise, assent.
